attributes.action: Grant full British citizenship to all Gurkhas, past and present, and their dependants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkhas have served the British Army with distinction and with loyalty not often found. We owe these excellent soldiers more than most people will ever know.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
